AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenPack
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sinks into her flower, granting her new abilities as well as enhanced Armor, Mana Per Second, Health Per Second, and splash damage.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenUnpack
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns comes out of her flower, granting her new abilities.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenShambler01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns summons [GetShamblersSummoned] Shamblers from her thorns to protect her. She may have [GetMaxShamblers] Shamblers active.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenShambler02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns summons [GetShamblersSummoned] Shamblers from her thorns to protect her. She may have [GetMaxShamblers] Shamblers active.

AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns summons [GetShamblersSummoned] Shamblers from her thorns to protect her. She may have [GetMaxShamblers] Shamblers active.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenShambler04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns summons [GetShamblersSummoned] Shamblers from her thorns to protect her. She may have [GetMaxShamblers] Shamblers active.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenConsumeShambler01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns absorbs an allied Shambler, killing it and restoring [GetHealthRestored] Health. Enemies near the Shambler take [GetDamage] damage.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenConsumeShambler02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns absorbs an allied Shambler, killing it and restoring [GetHealthRestored] Health. Enemies near the Shambler take [GetDamage] damage.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenConsumeShambler03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns absorbs an allied Shambler, killing it and restoring [GetHealthRestored] Health. Enemies near the Shambler take [GetDamage] damage.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenEntourage01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Increases Shambler Health by [GetShamblerHealth] and damage by [GetShamblerDamage].

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenEntourage02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Increases Shambler Health by [GetShamblerHealth] and damage by [GetShamblerDamage].

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenEntourage03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Increases Shambler Health by [GetShamblerHealth] and damage by [GetShamblerDamage].

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenTribute
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns demands tribute from her subjects. Gold production increased by [GetGoldBuff].

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenUproot01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends her vines deep beneath the earth to destroy target structure's foundation, dealing [GetDamage] damage over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamage: function(self) return math.floor( self.DamageAmt * self.Pulses ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenUproot02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends her vines deep beneath the earth to destroy target structure's foundation, dealing [GetDamage] damage over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamage: function(self) return math.floor( self.DamageAmt * self.Pulses ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends her vines deep beneath the earth to destroy target structure's foundation, dealing [GetDamage] damage over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamage: function(self) return math.floor( self.DamageAmt * self.Pulses ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenViolentSiege
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Queen of Thorns uses Uproot, the force shakes loose debris from the structure. Enemies standing near the structure take [GetDamage] damage while Uproot is active.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenGroundSpikes01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns radiates a forest of spikes around her, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and reducing armor by [GetArmorReduction] for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenGroundSpikes02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns radiates a forest of spikes around her, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and reducing armor by [GetArmorReduction] for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenGroundSpikes03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns radiates a forest of spikes around her, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and reducing armor by [GetArmorReduction] for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenGroundSpikes04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns radiates a forest of spikes around her, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage and reducing armor by [GetArmorReduction] for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenCompost01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: As nearby enemies die, their bodies nourish Queen of Thorns. For every 3 enemies killed, Uproot increases in damage. Her Shamblers gain Weapon Damage and Health. The effects cap at 9 enemies killed, and the effects diminish over time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenCompost02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: As nearby enemies die, their bodies nourish Queen of Thorns. For every 3 enemies killed, Uproot increases in damage. Her Shamblers gain Weapon Damage and Health. The effects cap at 9 enemies killed, and the effects diminish over time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenCompost03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: As nearby enemies die, their bodies nourish Queen of Thorns. For every 3 enemies killed, Uproot increases in damage. Her Shamblers gain Weapon Damage and Health. The effects cap at 9 enemies killed, and the effects diminish over time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenSpikeWave01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends out a powerful wave of spikes, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to anyone skewered and slowing enemies by [GetSlowAmount]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenSpikeWave02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends out a powerful wave of spikes, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to anyone skewered and slowing enemies by [GetSlowAmount]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns sends out a powerful wave of spikes, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to anyone skewered and slowing enemies by [GetSlowAmount]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenBrambleShield01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Thorns form a shield around an allied unit, absorbing [GetAbsorbAmt] damage.\nOnly one absorption effect per unit may be active at a time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenBrambleShield02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Thorns form a shield around an allied unit, absorbing [GetAbsorbAmt] damage.\nOnly one absorption effect per unit may be active at a time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenBrambleShield03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Thorns form a shield around an allied unit, absorbing [GetAbsorbAmt] damage.\nOnly one absorption effect per unit may be active at a time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenBrambleShield04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Thorns form a shield around an allied unit, absorbing [GetAbsorbAmt] damage.\nOnly one absorption effect per unit may be active at a time.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HQueenGoddessofThorns
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Queen of Thorns gains further mastery over nature. When she uses Ground Spikes, thorns encircle her, reducing damage taken by [GetReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds. Whenever she uses Bramble Shield, thorns encircle her and her army, dealing [GetThorns] damage to attackers for [GetDurationThorns] seconds.
